description:
## Proud STAGEHOLDER ![STAGEHOLDERS](https://cdn.stageholders.net/soonaverse/awards/Proud_STAGEHOLDER.png "STAGEHOLDERS")

### Conditions 

You can apply for this award **ONLY** by providing a **Contextual Identity** you generate from your account on *STAGEHOLDERS.net*.

[Click here for more details on how to apply!](https://stageholders.net/directions/soonaverse-stageholder)


### Allocation

This is awarded to **any** of the *STAGEHOLDERS.net* registered users, on a first come, first served manner. 
The only condition is to provide a valid Contextual Identity.

There is a maximum of 10,000 Awards available.

### Benefits
- 1 XP on SOONAVERSE
- 1 $BackSTAGE Tokens from *STAGEHOLDERS* project
- 100 $STAGE Tokens from *STAGEHOLDERS* project
- become member of the "Proud Group" on *STAGEHOLDERS*
- free valuable NFT dedicated to this category (to be announced soon)
- exclusive series distributed from NFT Collection (to be announced soon)
- discount on NFT sales (to be announced soon)
- 1+1 increased vote power on the *STAGEHOLDERS* Proposals
- exclusive token distribution from other projects on *STAGEHOLDERS* platform


### Support

If you need help please contact us at: contact@stageholders.net
name: Proud STAGEHOLDER
